iep_goals: Use appropriate volume and rate of speech during classroom discussions with 80% accuracy
Initiate conversations with peers using appropriate social skills in 6 out of 10 opportunities
accommodations: Modified assignments to account for language learning
learning_styles: benefits from cultural connections to learning

disabilities.name: language disorder due to hearing impairment

placement: 85% regular class, 15% speech therapy and ESL support

interviews.parent: Parent reports Isabella is quiet at home but seems to understand more than she expresses verbally.
interviews.teacher: Isabella is attentive and follows along but rarely volunteers to speak in class.

observations.psychologist: Mild hearing loss impacting speech development; strong nonverbal reasoning abilities.
